column5: Have you familiarized yourself with the many features and functions of your BMW i3 yet? We encourage you to reach out to your BMW center to set up your complimentary BMW Encore™ appointment. This special session is, scheduled at a time of your convenience to answer all the questions you may have about your BMW i3.Discover all the apps essential to your BMW i3 and learn more about the ChargeNow program below.

Not a lot of copy going on here.
